name: The Lego Waitress
description:
You're a Lego person who needs to make money, fast! 

What's the best way to make money? Waitressing customers at your local vacation spot! 

Get the customer their desired drinks and try to get your high score on the high score board

Move with [WASD], Run with [Shift], grab and give drinks with [E]. 

This game is a submission to Nordic game jam 2023 and was made by 6 students who study software at Aalborg university daily.
